summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of The Alley in Block 13, Ladd's Second Addition to South Seattle, being the alley between 12th Avenue South and 13th Avenue South from Nevada Street to Oregon Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving, constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6064, and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof.
committee: Finance, City Utilities and Streets & Sewers
